description:
This costume pack features the 12 members of the Taranis crew in fantasy-based attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Change Costumes" in the Options menu.

Contents:
Fantasy Costumes for Malt, Mei, Hanna, Kyle, Boron, Socks, Chick, Hack, Sheena, Jin, Wappa, and Britz (can be used during intermission and expedition)
name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Fantasy Costume Pack
